children.text:
IMPORTANT NOTES:
*ACP can NOT be moved to sdcard! Apps that use alarms and widgets break when doing so.

9/30/14- 
*Fixed many, many, many bugs
*Added Digital Clock widget for lock screen and home screen for android 4.2+
*Fixed problem with ads causing errors
*Dropped support for pre2.3 android devices
*AD-FREE VERSION NOW ONLY $0.99! Hit more apps below to upgrade
*PLEASE RATE THE APP OR SHARE ON FACEBOOK!!!!!




11/17/12- 
*Fixed many force close errors
*Fixed themes on old devices
7/06/12- 
*Removed many ad placements!
*Fixed shake to snooze on many phones
*Added new timepicker for ICS phones
*Added set button to color pickers
*Fixed shake to snooze on many phones
*Many other bug fixes
Reason for permissions used:
*Wake Lock - Keeps phone on when alarm sounds
*Disable Keyguard - Unlocks phone when alarm sounds
*Write External Storage - Allows settings to be backed up
*Phone State - So alarm doesn't sound loud while on the phone
*Network State - Required by Ad Providers
*Flashlight - To flash the flashligh when alarm sounds
*Internet - Weather/Ads

2/06/12- 
*All ICS bugs should now be fixed!
1/30/12- 
*Fixed more ICS bugs...
*Users running ICS, disable force gpu rendering to fix alarm screen (until next update)
*Next update currently testing, scheduled to be released 2/5

1/29/12- 
*Updates for ICS, some bug fixes
*Dim button removed... Now just tap background to dim
*Tapping the clock now opens alarms screen

11/17/11- 
*Added option in alarms to set alarm volume independent or not
*Turned off auto launch when plugged in by default
*Test Alarms now run immediately
*Many,many,many bug fixes, with redundent failovers in the code

8/7/11- 
*Gentle alarms now increase volume less drastically
*Clicking digits when setting alarm time will auto clear them
*Flashlight functionality now brightly flashes screen
*Music button now defaults correctly on htc phones
*Many,many,many bug fixes
-Thanks goes out to all the users out there! Another 2 weeks and I'll be done with school forever!
Another update coming in the next month or two adding new big features!.

6/5/11- 
*Hopefully fixed lock screen and alert window disappearing bug
*Sorry for all the recent updates, I've been on a massive bug fix quest
6/1/11- 
*Set Alarm via Google Voice Command for Android 2.3+
*Fixed bug with math blank math problems.
*Fixed bug with widgets

5/30/11- 
*Updated translations. Added Finnish.
*Many many bug fixes.
5/12/11- 
*Added option to override language, see button below.
*Fixed font labels.
5/10/11- 
*Added confirmation when checking skip next occurrence.
*Added hardware dim toggle for deskclock dim mode.
*Updated translations.
*Minor bug fixes.
3/9/11- 
*Added ability for one time skip repeating alarms (push and hold alarms to skip).
*Added option to use camera flash when alarm is triggered (might not work on all phones).
*Added option to disable chimes while ringer is muted.
*Finally fixed FC errors for MUIU firmware!

1/14-
*More bug fixes for 1.5/1.6 devices.
Don't automatically show this message again.
